channel.title: Thermal Blade
channel.description:
[size=18pt]I spent like 45 mins making this, I call it the Thermal blade. Fits on a character, nice poly count, all primitives. I used the knife tool to reduce some polys. If you want I'll release.[/size]
[size=14pt]V2[/size] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/warq08.jpg[/img] [size=14pt][/size]V1 [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2lw3sle.jpg[/img]

Even Making the blade a bit flatter will make it better.[/quote]
Appearently you didn’t see my wireframe…

looks okay, but why don’t you just make it thinner and smaller, i could help when i install my windows os on dualboot

Ok, but I still don’t want it to be TO small
I still want it slightly obnoxious, ya know?

Lemme see it lol[/quote]

item.title: Thermal Blade
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:20, topic:337181”]Thats gross. Its not smooth, ugly colors, bad hilt.

And its just a bad model.[/quote]
It’s supposed to be sharp around the edges. I wanted a bit of a dragonscale feel. And the colors are just a blue - purple gradient.
Now why don’t you do something useful with your post and give me some CC.

Read full topic

item.title: Thermal Blade
item.dc:creator: @qadh qadh
item.description:
@qadh wrote:

To be honest dude it is both too big and very ugly, you should remove the spikes on the hilt it just makes it look even worse, and the colors make me think of barf.
Also the giant band or elastic or whatever would make the sword cut into your back, make it a sheath or make it a held weapon.

That’s my cc I’m not gonna flame because I don’t like it im gonna tell you what I don’t like.

Read full topic

item.title: Thermal Blade

@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“justinxg27, post:1, topic:337186”]Kk, here’s some.

Okay, firstly it looks like your dads Dick, secondly why the fuck would you carry it genius…-.- thirdly, I can guess what made you think to make this piece of shit. You should probably make it a bit smaller like your cock, then eventually make it bigger as you’re cock grows.[/quote]

Lemme see some of your models
then you can start talkin shit

item.title: Thermal Blade
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“badger41, post:5, topic:337181”]as big as it is… that thing will break your back >.>

i see you did the same thing as me and made the back strap, my suggestion there is make it so it doesnt like rap around the back of the sword, instead make it so it looks like it clipped onto the sword on the side or something.[/quote]
Well unlike yours, it doesn’t have a sheath. This is more like putting a giant rubber band on you and the blade.
